```{r import_libraries, echo = FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(rmarkdown)    
library(epuRate)      
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(kableExtra)
```


```{r data_load}
# Loading of the data
data <- read.csv("data/gender_inequality.csv")
# First visualization
head(data, 20)

```

```{r lollipop}
data %>%
  filter(Gender.Inequality.Index..GII. != "..") %>%
  arrange(Gender.Inequality.Index..GII.) %>%
  head(20) %>%
  mutate(Country=factor(Country, Country)) %>%
  ggplot( aes(x=Country, y=Gender.Inequality.Index..GII.) ) +
    geom_segment( aes(x = Country, 
                      xend = Country,
                      y= Gender.Inequality.Index..GII.,
                      yend = Gender.Inequality.Index..GII.),
                  color = "grey") +
    geom_point(size=3, color="#69b3a2") +
    coord_flip() +
    theme_ipsum() +
    theme(panel.grid.minor.y = element_blank(),
          panel.grid.major.y = element_blank(),
          legend.position="none") +
    xlab("") +
    ylab("Gender Inequality Index")
```
